subject: Fix message action sheet not appearing on web mobile
body:
On web mobile, tapping a message was immediately executing an action
instead of showing the action sheet with options.

- Remove tap gesture on web platform (keep long-press and swipe only)
- Reduce long-press duration on web from 500ms to 300ms for better UX
- Keep native behavior unchanged (tap, long-press, and swipe all work)

This prevents accidental triggers on web while maintaining responsive
interaction through long-press (300ms) or swipe gestures.
title: Fix message action sheet not appearing on web mobile
